Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure?.place}}
{{flight.departure?.time}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival?.place}}
{{flight.arrival?.time}}
import { Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { FlightService } from './../api/services/flight.service' import { FlightRm } from './../api/models' @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flight', templateUrl: './search-flight.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flight.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightComponent implements OnInit{ searchResult: FlightRm[] = [] constructor(private flightService: FlightService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } search() { this.flightService.flightGet({}) .subscribe(r => this.searchResult = r) } }
